title: [Patch V9.14] - TFT - Weekly Mission Bug
body:
_Couldn't find a bug report section so it's going in here, sorry please move if needed._

**Server:** OCE
**Match Details:** TFT
**Type of Bug:** Client?
**Details:** So I'm attempting to do the mission (pic attached). Says you need to make a 3 star champion with 3 combined items. On my first game I did this, got no reward thought nothing of it until I tried again and still wasn't given the reward. This time I screen shot my level 3 Volibear with 3 combined items and I even won the game but was not rewarded for it? I closed the client and reopened it thinking there could be an error that resetting would fix.

Is this a bug or am I actually doing something wrong here. This is the 2nd mission that has been bugged in this mode.. Really annoying when they're so specific too.. Makes playing the game annoying. 

https://imgur.com/jSukILQ

https://imgur.com/yBOA8pl 

- Wolf {{champion:19}}

replies.body:
You can click the little picture of the bug in the bottom right-hand corner of the client: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115005466327-Report-a-Bug

Or you can head over to the report a bug section of boards on NA (_read the rules for posting and the sub-board guidelines before posting_):
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report
